targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="heap"}) / sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="heap"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap"}) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap"})
avg(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of minor GC"}[1m])) by(cause)

panels.title: Collections end of minor GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of minor GC"}[1m])/rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of minor GC"}[1m])) by(cause)

panels.title: Average Pause Durations end of minor GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of minor GC"}) by(cause)

panels.title: Maximum Pause Durations end of minor GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of major GC"}[1m])) by(cause)

panels.title: Collections end of major GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of major GC"}[1m])/rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of major GC"}[1m])) by(cause)

panels.title: Average Pause Durations end of major GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", action="end of major GC"}) by(cause)

panels.title: Maximum Pause Durations end of major GC by cause

targets.expr: avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'non-nmethods'"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'non-nmethods'"} )

avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'non-profiled nmethods'"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'non-profiled nmethods'"} )

avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'profiled nmethods'"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="CodeHeap 'profiled nmethods'"} )

avg(jvm_memory_used_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{service="$service", system_under_test="$system_under_test", test_environment="$test_environment", area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space"} )

panels.title: Average Compressed Class Space % in use
